attributes.action: Pressurise Royal Mail keeps its Pension commitments to all Postmen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail wishes to slash it's workers pension. The black hole in it's scheme is caused by Royal Mail taking a 10 year break from it's pension contributions. Once this is found acceptable at one comany many more will follow. all we ask is for what we paid for.
